remarks: If the join of two lattice planes covers one of them, their meet is a lattice line.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
2lplnm.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
2lplnm.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
2lplnm.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
2lplnm.n $e |- N = ( LLines ` K ) $.
2lplnm.p $e |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) $.
2lplnmN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. P /\ Y e. P ) /\ X C ( X .\/ Y ) ) -> ( X ./\ Y ) e. N ) $.
